fr.insarennes.learningbot.model

Class DecisionTreeNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.insarennes.learningbot.model.DecisionTreeNode
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Decision, Rule

    public abstract class DecisionTreeNode
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a node in the decision tree. It's abstract because a node will be a Rule or a Decision.
